title: New: Candy Paint – Vomit Lips
content:
What’s better than a bit of raucous, Pavement-inspired lo-fi on a Friday night? Not much, I tell you that.

SoCal based rockers Candy Paint explode onto the scene with their rampant debut track, Vomit Lips; a three minute barrage of sleaze, grit and scuzzy guitars, all built upon purposefully outdated sounding recording techniques. Soliloquising about drug-fueled binges, fucked up teenage romances and twisted regrets, Vomit Lips makes me feel like I’m at an illegal downtown garage-party as opposed to sitting at my desk, drinking green tea. Rock and roll, eh?

 Demon at the swap meet                                                                                                                         Yeah, sellin’ deficits for dirt cheap                                                                                                                    Don’t give a fuck about your policy
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
